pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bootstrapped Robustness Assessment for Qualitative Comparative Analysis // Test the robustness of a user's Qualitative Comparative Analysis solutions to randomness, using the bootstrapped assessment: baQCA(). This package also includes a function that provides recommendations for improving solutions to reach typical significance levels: brQCA(). Data included come from McVeigh et al. (2014) doi:10.1177/0003122414534065.
